original_text: The husband will be innocent of any wrongdoing, but the woman will bear the consequences of her sin.’”
korean_text: 남편은 무죄할 것이요 여인은 죄가 있으면 당하리라

sentences.original_text: The husband will be innocent of any wrongdoing,
sentences.korean_translation: 남편은 어떤 잘못에도 죄가 없을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: but the woman will bear the consequences
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여자는 그 결과를 짊어질 것입니다
